citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:25 pm on 16
February 2022. Arrived at the site address and called the contact numbers and left a message. Received a call back
within 5 minutes, but the site 002 address was incorrect. Discussed how to cancel this site and add the correct site as
well as new site inspection procedures with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 5:25 pm on 16 
February 2022.  Arrived at the site address and called the contact numbers and left a message.  Received a call back 
within 5 minutes, but the site 002 address was incorrect.  Discussed how to cancel this site and add the correct site as 
well as new site inspection procedures with the licensee. 
 
 
 
End Section
